Articles.Content:
instead of having massive multiplayer why not have online co op rooms.

that way the only one who would have control of the time warp would be the captain.

and also it would be fun to be a passenger or fly around carrying your friends like that.

what do you think.

First off, this is not the suggestion forum. And secondly, multiplayer is literally THE number one thing not to suggest, as seen here. This is not limited to simply suggesting multiplayer, but also talking about how it could work.

Edited July 20, 2013 by AustralianFries

AustralianFries got it right. Closing this.

There's a multiplayer project being developed in the add-on dev forum. Please discuss multiplayer there if need be, but keep it on the subject of the mod if you do.
